subject: Order No. SSN1776 - Broken Gas Pedal
description_text:
Good afternoon,

I’m reaching out because the part that holds the spring to the load cell on the gas pedal has broken again. You guys had previously sent me replacement parts, they were replaced correctly, but still broke again. 

I was wondering if it was possible to be sent a replacement throttle pedal of the Pro X Ultra with RGB. 

Thank you,
Luis D. Prieto
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Luis Prieto,  Please remove the two damaged replacement parts and place them together for a photo. We will compare the images and have our operations team verify them. The second replacement we sent you is an improved version, which theoretically should not be able to detach from the blue limiter and cause damage.

Hi, 

I don’t have the original damaged part, it was thrown away months ago after replacing it. 

I will be sending over a picture of the new damaged part, which just simply snapped. 


Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi Luis Prieto,  Please provide your order number, contact name, address, and phone number, and we will send you a replacement throttle pedal.

Hello,

Order no.: SSN1776
Name: Luis Prieto
Address: 15761 SW 59th Ter Miami,Fl 33193
Phone number: (786) 525-6378

Thank you for your excellent customer service, you guys are great. 

Best, 
Luis D Prieto 
Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi Luis Prieto,    Here is your logistics tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045996740310
